name: 20000 BOWLING LEAGUES
description:
Move the  tiny crab 20000 leagues under the sea.  The positive side of this is the crab can cling to different surfaces to get star(fish) points.

The negative side of this is it's BOWLING leagues! To collect the starfish points, you must carry the bowling ball (which tends to get away). The ball usually rolls a few spaces away but you may have to restart game if you cant get the crab to carry it again. Oh the frustrating fun in this whale of a tale! The goal is to make it all the way (with the bowling ball of course) to  the underwater submerged abandoned bowling alley!!!  

hit the button on left side to begin

arrow keys to move the crab around, try to balance the bowling ball while collecting starfish!!

enjoy!
